extension.description:
ContactUs Form

Add a contact form in joomla articles

Usage:
{contactus mailto=address#mydomain.com } {contactus mailto=address#mydomain.com;otheraddress#mydomain.com }

Due to joomla antispam protection
you have to use # (sharp) instead of @ (snail) in the email address
otherwise it won't work!!!
